modName: Valkerye Strong-Arm - A Beautiful Blades Follower
summary: This mod adds a new follower to Skyrim called Valkerye, a follower which works with the Blades.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new follower to Skyrim called Valkerye, a follower which works with the Blades. This mod is completely lore friendly and she can be married. She is located in the Bannered Mare, Whiterun. If she isn't there when you get there, wait.

==INSTALLATION==
- This is my first mod so I'm not sure if this works if you download it with NMM. To be safe, download and install it manually. If you don't know how to do that, this is how you do it:
/Program Files (x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/Data/

Once you have reached the Data folder, just drag and drop the files into it. If something pops up, just agree.

==BUGS==
If you are experiencing any bugs, please contact me or leave it in the comments. I will try my best to fix them.

If possible, please give me feedback! As you know, this is my first mod. Having feedback would help me in the future to make and improve more mods.
author: Anyllus
